short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Allows Hyland RPA to access and automate the browser.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The Hyland RPA Automation Extension is used to connect Hyland RPAâ€™s Web Automation to your browser. Leverage the browser for attended and unattended automation. Using this extension, you can automate tasks with ease. This extension requires additional software to build the automation flow. Make sure that you have downloaded and installed the Hyland RPA Designer before using this plugin. The Hyland RPA Designer is a low code tool that will convert your actions into an automation flow.
